title: Black Prince
steps: Add all ingredients, with ice, to a mixing glass
Twist an orange peel to express the oil atop the drink, and garnish with a maraschino cherry
notes: Created by Philip Ward (inventor of the Penicillin).
Use your favorite aged rum for a deep, rich flavor â€“ enhanced by the coffee and cocoa notes from the Averna Amaro.
Using a different rum or sweet vermouth will result in subtly different flavors coming through.
